channel.title: 2019 on Jiten Agarwal
channel.description: Recent content in 2019 on Jiten Agarwal

item.title: 2019: Year in Review
item.description: 2019 was easily the best year of my life so far. No, I didn’t start a company. No, I didn’t get married. No, I didn’t get a Job in Apple. But I still think 2019 was full of amazing learnings, travel stories, friendships. When I was thinking of what format this blog should be in. The first idea that came to my mind was to just write down the most interesting events month-wise, but then I thought that would be too boring.
